action

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • action.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForeseeableAction, OneStepAction, Scheduler

    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a non-specific Action
    Author:
    Alexandre LEFEBVRE - Thomas OSTROWSKI

      Constructor and Description
      Action() 
      Action(int time)
      Constructor of the Action class, it creates an Action and initializes the Action to the time given in parameters
